channel.title: Real Estate
channel.description: Find a new home. Search real estate listings to buy, sell or rent a house, apartment or condo in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, Florida & beyond. Open house listings are also available.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2016 The New York Times Company

item.title: Homes that Sold for $450,000 and Under
item.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
item.author: Compiled by C.J. HUGHES

item.title: A Roommate Dies; Must His Estate Pay the Rent?
item.description: A landlord can sue any or all those named on the lease, so it’s best to keep paying the rent.
item.author: By RONDA KAYSEN

item.title: Georgetown, Washington, D.C.: Postcard-Pretty
item.description: Georgetown is a picturesque area with cobbled streets, historic homes and a lively shopping and dining district.
item.author: By JULIE LASKY

item.title: Living in Georgetown, Washington, D.C
item.description: Georgetown is a picturesque area with cobbled streets, historic homes and a lively shopping and dining district.

item.title: Gentrification Protesters in Los Angeles Target Art Galleries
item.description: Spray paint and hurled bottles draw the notice of the police as a neighborhood’s Mexican-American residents fear being displaced.
item.author: By JENNIFER MEDINA

item.title: ‘We Almost Have Riots’: Tensions Flare in Silicon Valley Over Growth
item.description: As the region has become more congested and expensive, there are growing demands to rein in the physical space that many technologists call home.
item.author: By DAVID STREITFELD

item.title: On the Market in the New York Region
item.description: This week’s properties include a six-bedroom in Briarcliff Manor, N.Y., and a three-bedroom in Ridgefield, Conn.

item.title: Homes for Sale in New York and Connecticut
item.description: This week’s properties include a six-bedroom in Briarcliff Manor, N.Y., and a three-bedroom in Ridgefield, Conn.

item.title: Homes for Sale in Brooklyn and Manhattan
item.description: This week’s properties are on the Upper East Side, in Carnegie Hill and in Brooklyn Heights.
item.author: By MICHELLE HIGGINS

item.title: On the Market in the New York Region
item.description: This week’s properties are on the Upper East Side, in Carnegie Hill and in Brooklyn Heights.
